title: Regional Gross Value Added (Production Approach) Constrained Data Tables
summary: Experimental statistics showing annual estimates of regional GVA(P) NUTS1 and NUTS2, current price, CVM (2012=100) and implied deflators.
metaDescription: Experimental statistics showing annual estimates of regional GVA(P) NUTS1 and NUTS2, current price, CVM (2012=100) and implied deflators.
